Overview

Module nodefinder_multicast

  • Description
  • Function Index
  • Function Details
Multicast Erlang node discovery protocol.

Behaviours: gen_server.

Description

Multicast Erlang node discovery protocol. Listens on a multicast channel for node discovery requests and responds by connecting to the node.
